pr_title: [Feature] Batch update partition's property in one command

timeline.bodyText: 保留 MODIFY PARTITION partition_name  这种写法
timeline.author: morningman
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -64,7 +64,7 @@ under the License.
             
     3. 修改分区属性
         语法：
-            MODIFY PARTITION partition_name SET ("key" = "value", ...)
+            MODIFY PARTITION (p1[, p2, ...]) SET ("key" = "value", ...)

timeline.author: morningman

timeline.bodyText: better to write meta in one edit log
timeline.author: morningman

timeline.bodyText: Should print "*" if needExpand is true
timeline.author: morningman
morningman

timeline.bodyText: private, and no need to be static. And method name can be changed to checkProperties.
